00036 class WHIPTK_API WT_Polyline : public WT_Drawable, public WT_Point_Set
00037 {
00038         friend class WT_W2D_Class_Factory;
00039         friend class WT_Opcode;
00040     friend class WT_Polymarker;
00041 public:
00042 
00044     WT_Polyline ()
00045     {}
00046 
00048     WT_Polyline(
00049         int                         count, 
00050         WT_Logical_Point const *    points, 
00051         WT_Boolean                  copy 
00052         ) throw(WT_Result)
00053         : WT_Point_Set(count, points, copy)
00054     { }
00055 
00057     WT_Polyline(const WT_Polyline & pline) throw(WT_Result)
00058         : WT_Drawable()
00059         , WT_Point_Set(pline.count(), pline.points(), !!pline.allocated())
00060     { }
00061 
00063     virtual ~WT_Polyline()
00064     { }
00065 public:
00067 
00070     WT_Polyline const & operator= (const WT_Polyline & pline) throw(WT_Result)
00071     {
00072         set(pline.count(), pline.points(), !!pline.allocated());
00073         return *this;
00074     }
00075 
00077     virtual WT_Result   delay(WT_File & file) const;
00078     virtual WT_Result   dump(WT_File & file) const;
00079     WT_ID            object_id() const;
00080     WT_Result        materialize(WT_Opcode const & opcode, WT_File & file);
00081     virtual WT_Boolean  merge(WT_Drawable const & current);
00082     WT_Result        process(WT_File & file);
00083     WT_Result        serialize(WT_File & file) const;
00084     WT_Result        skip_operand(WT_Opcode const & opcode, WT_File & file);
00085     virtual void     update_bounds(WT_File * file);

00094         );
